member.name: M:MathNet.Spatial.Euclidean.CoordinateSystem.RotateTo(MathNet.Spatial.Euclidean.UnitVector3D,MathNet.Spatial.Euclidean.UnitVector3D,System.Nullable{MathNet.Spatial.Euclidean.UnitVector3D})
member.summary: Sets to the matrix of rotation that aligns the 'from' vector with the 'to' vector. The optional Axis argument may be used when the two vectors are perpendicular and in opposite directions to specify a specific solution, but is otherwise ignored.
member.param: Input Vector object to align from.
Input Vector object to align to.

member.name: M:MathNet.Spatial.Euclidean.CoordinateSystem.CreateMappingCoordinateSystem(MathNet.Spatial.Euclidean.CoordinateSystem,MathNet.Spatial.Euclidean.CoordinateSystem)
member.summary: Creates a coordinate system that maps from the 'from' coordinate system to the 'to' coordinate system.
Sets this matrix to be the matrix that maps from the 'from' coordinate system to the 'to' coordinate system.
member.param: Input Point3D that defines the origin to map the coordinate system from.
Input Vector3D object that defines the X-axis to map the coordinate system from.
Input Vector3D object that defines the Y-axis to map the coordinate system from.
Input Vector3D object that defines the Z-axis to map the coordinate system from.
Input Point3D object that defines the origin to map the coordinate system to.
Input Vector3D object that defines the X-axis to map the coordinate system to.
Input Vector3D object that defines the Y-axis to map the coordinate system to.
Input Vector3D object that defines the Z-axis to map the coordinate system to.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Quaternion.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Quaternion.

member.name: M:MathNet.Spatial.Euclidean.Quaternion.Scalar
member.summary: Returns a new Quaternion q with the Scalar part only. If you need a Double, use the Real-Field instead.

member.name: M:MathNet.Spatial.Euclidean.Quaternion.Vector
member.summary: Returns a new Quaternion q with the Vector part only.

member.name: M:MathNet.Spatial.Euclidean.Quaternion.UnitVector
member.summary: Returns a new normalized Quaternion u with the Vector part only, such that ||u|| = 1. Q may then be represented as q = r*(cos(phi) + u * sin(phi)) = r*exp(phi*u) where r is the absolute and phi the argument of q.

member.name: M:MathNet.Spatial.Euclidean.Quaternion.Sign
member.summary: Returns a new normalized Quaternion q with the direction of this quaternion.

member.name: M:MathNet.Spatial.Euclidean.Quaternion.Divide(MathNet.Spatial.Euclidean.Quaternion)
member.summary: Multiplies a Quaternion with the inverse of another Quaternion (q*q-1). Note that for Quaternions q*q-1 is not the same then q-1*q, because this will lead to a rotation in the other direction.

member.name: M:MathNet.Spatial.Euclidean.Quaternion.Divide(System.Double)
member.summary: Multiplies a Quaternion with the inverse of a real number.
member.remarks: Its also possible to cast a double to a Quaternion and make the division afterward, but that would be more expensive.

member.summary: Inverts this quaternion.

member.summary: Gets the real part of the quaternion.

member.name: P:MathNet.Spatial.Euclidean.Quaternion.ImagX
member.summary: Gets the imaginary X part (coefficient of complex I) of the quaternion.

member.name: P:MathNet.Spatial.Euclidean.Quaternion.ImagY
member.summary: Gets the imaginary Y part (coefficient of complex J) of the quaternion.

member.name: P:MathNet.Spatial.Euclidean.Quaternion.ImagZ
member.summary: Gets the imaginary Z part (coefficient of complex K) of the quaternion.

member.name: P:MathNet.Spatial.Euclidean.Quaternion.Abs
member.summary: Gets the standard euclidean length |q| = sqrt(||q||) of the quaternion q: the square root of the sum of the squares of the four components. Q may then be represented as q = r*(cos(phi) + u * sin(phi)) = r*exp(phi*u) where u is the unit vector and phi the argument of q.

member.name: P:MathNet.Spatial.Euclidean.Quaternion.Norm
member.summary: Gets the norm ||q|| = |q|^2 of the quaternion q: the sum of the squares of the four components.

member.name: P:MathNet.Spatial.Euclidean.Quaternion.Arg
member.summary: Gets the argument phi = arg(q) of the quaternion q, such that q = r*(cos(phi) + u * sin(phi)) = r*exp(phi*u) where r is the absolute and u the unit vector of q.

member.name: P:MathNet.Spatial.Euclidean.Quaternion.IsUnitQuaternion
member.summary: True if the quaternion q is of length |q| = 1.
member.remarks: To normalize a quaternion to a length of 1, use the method. All unit quaternions form a 3-sphere.

member.summary: Sets to the matrix of rotation that would align the 'from' vector with the 'to' vector. The optional Axis argument may be used when the two vectors are perpendicular and in opposite directions to specify a specific solution, but is otherwise ignored.

Value
Description
A negative integer
This instance is smaller than .
Zero
This instance is equal to .
A positive integer
This instance is larger than .
